texts.Notifications:001404: The notification template does not exist!
texts.Notifications:002400: The static notification group {Name} is not allowed to change!
texts.Notifications:002403: Notification that the {Name} group already exists!
texts.Notifications:002404: Notification group with the Name {Name} was not found!
texts.Notifications:003400: Static advice {Name} is not allowed to change!
texts.Notifications:003401: Failed to retrieve the notification {Name} group definition!
texts.Notifications:003404: No notification definition with the Name {Name} was found!
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.Description:NotificationType: The Service Callback only supports the SignalR provider
texts.Description:NotificationLifetime: Only One notifications cancel the user's subscription after they are sent.
texts.Description:ContentType: The receiver should process the notification content according to the content form.
texts.Description:AllowSubscriptionToClients: Whether notifications can be subscribed by the user on the client.
texts.Description:Providers: By which providers the notification can be published to subscribers after it is sent, leaving it blank will be handled by all providers.
texts.Description:Template: The notification template is required when sending template notifications.
texts.ItemWillBeDeleteOrRestoreMessage: If the notification has been changed, it will revert to the default notification. Otherwise, the custom notification is removed.
